author: Staff Reporter
text:
A flying squad seized unaccounted cash to the tune of Rs. 1.01 lakh from a trader from Thiruvananthapuram in Samiyarmadam under the Padmanabhapuram constituency on Friday night.

According to officials, the cash was seized from a trader on the Nagercoil-Thiruvananthapuram National Highway while he was returning from Thoothukudi during a routine vehicle check in Samiyarmadam.

No proof

As the trader was unable to prove why he was carrying the cash, it was seized, an official said.

As many as 34 cases for various violations, along with one case of cash seizure, had been registered in Kanyakumari district since the model code of conduct came into effect, the official said.
title: Flying squad seizes Rs. 1 lakh in Samiyarmadam
